data.expected_result: Be able to see the Hypesquad or Nitro Badge
data.short_description: Unable to view Nitro/Hypesquad Badge of user you share no servers with
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user that you do not share any servers with that is either a Nitro or Hypesquad member (easier said than done, I know) - Attempt to view user's profile - Notice the lack of badge
